Responses.Text: What do you want from me?

DialogueNodes.Text: The apartment on your left... used to have a paranoid man living in it. One day, he hung himself. Rumor has it, before he died, he hid some valuable treasure in there, in a room full of traps.

Responses.Text: The last person who offered me something almost got me killed.

DialogueNodes.Text: You can trust me! Find the money. There's a crazy survivalist living there. He has everything you could need: food, medincine,drugs, weapons. How about making a deal with me, huh?
Heh, let's just say I have my reasons. Don't worry about it. So, are we on?
Good choice. The door's unlocked. Be careful with those traps, kiddo.
Did you get the treasure, kiddo?
Ha ha! I knew you could make it, kiddo. I'll tell you what. There's a handy little fire escape plan in the bedside drawers in the other apartment. Might show you a way out eh!
Then get your ass back in there and find it for me!
Heh, watch yourself in there. (He walks off, seemingly unaware that he never asked for you to actually give him the 'treasure')
